snippet: Both companies raised prices while facing higher costs, but only Colgate-Palmolive was helped by strong sales.
lead_paragraph: Both companies raised prices while facing higher costs, but only Colgate-Palmolive was helped by strong sales.

headline.main: Colgate Profit Rises 4 % While Procter’s Falls 2%
headline.print_headline: Colgate Profit Rises 4 % While Procter’s Falls 2%
headline.seo: Colgate Profit Rises While Procter’s Falls
